remarks: Subgroup sum membership (for a left module or left vector space). (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lsmelval.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
lsmelval.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lsmelvali $p |- ( ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) /\ ( X e. T /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( T .(+) U ) ) $.
